summary: CONSUMER HAD PROBLEMS WITH INTERMITTENT ENGINE STALLING.  WHILE DRIVING THE VEHICLE ON  THE HIGHWAY AT 70 MPH VEHICLE LOST TOTAL POWER WHICH LEFT THE DRIVER WITH NO POWER STEERING OR BRAKES. DEALER WAS CONTACTED, AND  VEHICLE WAS TAKEN INTO THE SHOP, BUT THE DEALER WAS NOT ABLE TO FIND ANYTHING.*AK
